text: Sano nambo aŵala ŵakulupilile ni kutendaga yambone, basi chachalipila malipilo gao mwakwana ni kwajonjechesya mu ukoto Wakwe, nambo aŵala ŵakanile (kun'galagatila Allah) ni kulikwesya, basi tachalagasya ni ilagasyo yakupoteka nnope, soni ngasampata nkwagosa namuno nkwakamuchisya jwangaŵaga Allah
